page.title: 03THREE CROSSES
page.content: I live in{Three Crosses}where there is an old primary school for infants and juniors. In the village there is an old chapel. Not a lot of people go there. Mainly people go there a lot when there is a funeral. When the kids in the primary school have a harvest festival or a Christmas service they are held in the old chapel. We usually start school at 3 or 4. I have now finished in the Primary school and have to catch a coach to{Bishopston {Comprehensive}which is 6 miles away. In our village we have a hairdressers, 2 shops and a Post Office. There are a few cattle grids around. In{Bishopston school}we have to wear a school uniform. A blue skirt (for girls), a blue or grey jumper, black shoes, white or blue shirt, black trousers (for boys) and a blue,yellow and green tie. YASMIN CHAUDHRY 2B
